mapper.select: SELECT CH.H_IDX, CH.FROM_ID, CH.TO_ID, CH.SUBJECT, CH.FROM_STATUS, CH.TO_STATUS, CH.TIME, U.U_PIC FROM CHAT_HEADER CH JOIN USER_INFO U ON U.U_ID = DECODE(CH.FROM_ID, #{u_id}, CH.TO_ID, CH.FROM_ID) WHERE CH.FROM_ID = #{u_id} OR CH.TO_ID = #{u_id} ORDER BY time DESC
